name.ja: ゴーティスの<ruby>月<rt>つき</rt></ruby><ruby>夜<rt>よ</rt></ruby>サイクス

text.en: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 Fish monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Psiics, Moonlight of the Ghoti", then banish 1 Fish monster from your hand or face-up field. If this card is banished: You can banish 1 Fish monster from your hand, face-up field, or GY, except "Moonlight of the Ghoti"; Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "Psiics, Moonlight of the Ghoti" once per turn.
